So far, you have learnt to ask a RQ, design a study, collect the data, and describe the data.
**In this chapter**, you will learn to compare *quantitative* data in different groups.
You will learn to:

* compare quantitative data between individuals using the appropriate graphs.
* compare quantitative between within individuals in summary tables.
